(:action fold ; Combine actions related to folding to transform items
  :parameters (?npc - player ?item - object ?status_item - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (inventory ?npc ?item) 
    (or (rolled ?item) (cut ?item) (folded ?item))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (or 
      (and (not (rolled ?item))

(:action cut ; Cut an object and update its state
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object ?target - target_type)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?npc ?item) (modifiable ?item))
  :effect (and (cut ?item ?target) (not (modifiable ?item))

(:action tape_ends
  :parameters (?npc - player ?tape - duct_tape ?ends - ends)
  :precondition (and (half_folded ?tape) (inventory ?npc ?tape))
  :effect (and (ends_taped ?tape ?ends) (organization ?ends touching) (form ?ends joined_together))

(:action tape
  :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?target - entity)
  :precondition (and (prepared ?item) (inventory ?npc ?item))
  :effect (and (applied ?item ?target) (organization ?target improved) (status ?target modified))
